duties.duty: Experience with code versioning tools (such as Git).
The layout of the web-pages with clean cross-browser valid code using Figma.
Experience in web application development using JavaScript.
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Developing new user-facing features using React.js.
Implementation and training of new software products.
Conducting webinars and presentations about new programs.
Carrying out inventories of goods and materials in the supermarket chain of the company, in the city of Dnipro and in the regions of Ukraine.
Drawing up reports on the results of inventory.
Team management (up to 20 people) in the process of inventory.
Supervising the work of junior staff.
